CampaignCreated(bytes32).details: Emitted when the author creates the campaign.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the campaign data stored in IPFS.

ChangeStatusCampaign().details: Emitted when the status of the campaign change.

CloseProposalClosed(uint256).details: Emitted when a  close proposal is Closed.

params._index: The index of the close proposal.

CloseProposalCreated(bytes32).details: Emitted when a member creates a proposal to close the campaign and get the founds back.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the close proposal data stored in IPFS.

CloseProposalVoted(uint256).details: Emitted when a close proposal is voted.

params._index: The index of the close proposal.

NewContribution().details: Emitted when a new person contributes with the campaign.

ProgressUpdate(bytes32).details: Emitted when the author creates a progress update to show how the proyect is going.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the progress update data stored in IPFS.

ProposalClosed(uint256).details: Emitted when a proposal is Closed.

ProposalCreated(bytes32).details: Emitted when the author creates a proposal to free founds.

params._ipfshash: The url hash of the proposal data stored in IPFS.

ProposalRelease(uint256).details: Emitted when a proposal was release.

ProposalVoted(uint256).details: Emitted when a proposal is voted.

withdrawFounds(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Emitted when a member withdraw his founds.

approveCloseProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to approve an active close proposal that they haven't voted before.

params._index: index of the close proposal the member wants to approve.

approveProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to approve an active proposal that they haven't voted before.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to approve.

closeCloseProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to close an active proposal that already has its voting time over.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to approve.

closeProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to close an active proposal that already has its voting time over.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to approve.

params._goal: goal in wei that the proyect has to reach to be succesfull.
params._ipfshash: The url hash of the campaign data previusly stored in IPFS.*
params._minimunContribution: minimum contribution in wei that a person has to make to become a member.

contribute().details: Allow not members to contribute with the campaign and be a member of it.

createCloseProposal(bytes32).details: Allow only members to create a new proposal to finish de proyect and get the founds back.

params._ipfshash: url hash of the close proposal data (description) previusly stored in IPFS.

createProposal(uint256,address,bytes32).details: Allow only owner to create a new proposal to get more founds.

params._ipfshash: url hash of the proposal data (description and pictures) previusly stored in IPFS.
params._recipient: address where the founds are going to be after release them.
params._value: founds in wei that the owner want to release.

disapproveCloseProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to disapprove an active close proposal that they haven't voted before.

params._index: index of the close proposal the member wants to disapprove.

disapproveProposal(uint256).details: Allow only members to disapprove an active proposal that they haven't voted before.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to disapprove.

getCampaignInfo().details: Function to get the data of the campaign

getCloseProposal(uint256).details: Function to get the data of a close proposal.

params._index: index of the proposal to return

getCloseProposalsCount().details: Function to get the total number of close proposals.

getFinalContributions().details: Function to get the finalContributions of the campaign.

getProposal(uint256).details: Function to get the data of a proposal.

params._index: index of the proposal to return

getProposalsCount().details: Function to get the total number of proposals.

getRemainingContributions().details: Function to get the remainingContributions of the campaign.

getStatus().details: Function to get the actual status of the campaign.

hasVotedCloseProposal(uint256).details: Function to know if a member has already vot a close proposal.

hasVotedProposal(uint256).details: Function to know if a member has already vot a proposal.

isMember(address).details: Function to return if someone is member.

release(uint256).details: Allow only members to close an active proposal that already has its voting time over.

params._index: index of the proposal the member wants to approve.

saveProgressUpdate(bytes32).details: Allow only owner to save a new progress Update data ipfs hash.

params._ipfshash: url hash of the progress update data (description and pictures) previusly stored in IPFS.

setActive().details: Allow only owner to change the status of the cCampaign from CREATED to ACTIVE.

withdraw().details: Allow only members to withdraw the remaining founds once the campaign is closed.
